ticket.title: FAC: GateLease proto message and Rust types

in_scope: Add GateLease and AatLeaseExtension proto messages
Create GateLease Rust types with all required fields
Implement signature validation using domain separator

steps: Add AatLeaseExtension message for AAT-specific lease fields
Define GateLease struct with all 12 fields
Implement Canonicalize trait with deterministic field ordering
Implement validate_scope() for subset rule enforcement
Write unit tests for serialization roundtrip
Write unit tests for scope validation

criteria: GateLease Rust types match proto schema
Signature validation uses GATE_LEASE_ISSUED_PREFIX domain separator
Scope subset rule prevents child lease from broadening scope

notes.security:
GateLease binds executor authority to specific changeset and time window.
The subset rule ensures delegation cannot broaden permissions.
notes.implementation_details:
GateLease fields:
- lease_id, work_id, gate_id, changeset_digest
- executor_actor_id, issued_at, expires_at
- policy_hash, issuer_actor_id, issuer_signature
- time_envelope_ref, aat_extension (optional)

AatLeaseExtension fields:
- view_commitment_hash, rcp_manifest_hash
- rcp_profile_id, selection_policy_id
